title: Document Paul et al. 2023 universal obstruction theory connection
description:
The FastObstructionDetector implements parametric obstruction checking as formalized in:

**Paul, Protopapas, Thilikos (2023)** 'Graph Parameters, Universal Obstructions, and WQO' arXiv:2304.03688

Key theoretical connection:
- pobs≤m(tw) = {K₅, K₃,₃} (Proposition 46, Section 6.1)
- Our detect_both() computes exactly this parametric obstruction
- disc_dimension_via_obstructions() uses this to bound treewidth-class parameters

The paper proves:
1. Universal obstructions characterize asymptotic behavior of graph parameters
2. For treewidth: grid sequence Γ is the universal obstruction
3. Class obstruction cobs(tw) = {planar graphs}
4. Parametric obstruction = obs(planar) = {K₅, K₃,₃}

Theorem 44: ω²-wqo ⟺ all ≤-monotone parameters have finite universal obstructions

This validates our approach: detecting K₅/K₃,₃ is the correct way to bound disc dimension for brain network analysis.
